alert.note: Alert for Orange; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 20 at 5:18PM EDT until September 20 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Orange County in east central Florida... North central Osceola County in east central Florida... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 517 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Lake Toho, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Buena Ventura Lakes, East Lake Toho, and Narcoossee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
